data.title: Throne Saturn Novel Space by Drury Allen
data.meta_description: The Throne of Saturn : A Novel of Space and Politics by Drury, Allen and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Good. Former library book; may include library markings. Used book that is in clean, average condition without any missing pages.

Paperback (VG-); all our specials have minimal description to keep listing them viable. They are at least reading copies, complete and in reasonable condition, but usually secondhand; frequently they are superior examples. Ordering more than one book will reduce your overall postage costs.

Kartoniert / Broschiert. Condition: New. Dieser Artikel ist ein Print on Demand Artikel und wird nach Ihrer Bestellung fuer Sie gedruckt. KlappentextA classic alternate space-race story of the first manned mission to Mars from political mastermind Allen Drury, author of Advise and ConsentMaster novelist Drury probes the controversy and political machinations as America .

Condition: Very Good. Stated 1st edition, Very Good/Good+ DJ in Mylar, dustjacket has a 2-inch tear on rear, tiny tears & creases at head of spine, very light soiling, in new Mylar with price intact, fading to front board under DJ, 3 corners lihjtly bumped, bookplate on rear endpaper, clean text with no markings found.

Hardcover. Condition: Good. No Jacket. 1st Edition. Blue cloth boards with red title box on spine. Silver lettering on spine. Soiling and fading to the boards. Binding is tight and square. Pages are clean throughout. Stated First Edition. Good reading copy.

Very good with good to very good dust jacket. Bookplate on front endpaper. A few small spots on page fore edge and at top page edge. Dust jacket is worn at spine tips and corners with a one inch tear at bottom front corner.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First edition. About Very good in very good dustwrapper. Rear hinge cracked. Edges of blue cloth cover faded. Corners bent. Edges of spine bumped. Small tears on edges of dustwrapper Sticker shadow on dustwrapper spine and front dustwrapper. Spine lean. Please Note: This book has been transferred to Between the Covers from another database and might not be described to our usual standards. Please inquire for more detailed condition information.
